subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Ronaldinho and Robinho will try to lead Brazil to its first Olympic gold medal in soccer in Beijing. The 18-player team was announced Monday by its coach, Dunga, 15 days before the squad is scheduled to begin preparation for the Games. The Olympics is the only significant title Brazil, a five-time World Cup champion, has not won.
